import axios from'axios';import{mongo}from'mongoose';//import BookList from '../components/BookList'
var baseUrl='/api/blogs';//langApp
var getWord=function getWord(word){var wo=word.slice(0,2);var request=axios.get("api/blogs/letters/".concat(wo,"/").concat(word));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(err){return console.log("Could not get the word in the given form",err);});};//old
var getAll=function getAll(){var request=axios.get(baseUrl);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var getBookList=function getBookList(){var request=axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"/booklist"));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var getBook=function getBook(title){var request=axios.get("".concat(baseUrl,"/book/").concat(title));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var create=function create(newObject){var request=axios.post("".concat(baseUrl,"/mongonew"),newObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var update=function update(id,newObject){var request=axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject);return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};var deleteById=function deleteById(id){var request=axios.delete("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id));return request.then(function(response){return response.data;});};// eslint-disable-next-line import/no-anonymous-default-export
export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update,deleteById:deleteById,getWord:getWord,getBookList:getBookList,getBook:getBook};
